meanings.sent1: The vanned animals arrived safely at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The vanned packages were delivered to the customers.
meanings.sent3: The vanned toys seemed to enjoy the ride in the van.
meanings.sent4: The vanned books were on a thrilling adventure in the van.
meanings.sent5: The vanned flowers bloomed beautifully during the journey.

meanings.definition: To transport or carry in a van.
meanings.sent1: The movers vanned the furniture to the new house.
meanings.sent2: They vanned the equipment to the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The friends vanned together for a road trip.
meanings.sent4: She vanned her belongings to the storage unit.
meanings.sent5: The team vanned their gear to the competition.
